A4.text: The series was between the Eastern Conference and two-time defending Stanley Cup champion Tampa Bay Lightning and the Western Conference champion Colorado Avalanche.

A5.text: The Avalanche defeated the Lightning four games to two in the best-of-seven series, earning their third Stanley Cup championship in franchise history and first since 2001.

A6.text: As a result, they remain the only active NHL team that has won all of its appearances in the Stanley Cup Final.

A7.text: defeating the two-time defending champion Tampa Bay Lightning in six games.

A8.text: In the 2020 Stanley Cup Final, the Lightning met the Dallas Stars.
